title: Chapter 2132 - Chapter 2132: The Terrifying Heaven Realm’S Prodigy
body:
Chapter 2132 - Chapter 2132: The Terrifying Heaven Realm’S Prodigy

Chapter 2132: The terrifying heaven realm’s prodigy

Translator: 549690339

Many people’s gazes moved. The heaven realm1 s proud Son of Heaven was challenging the primordial realm’s proud Son of Heaven.

But thinking about it, it was normal. They were all young people, full of vigor and confidence. When they saw a strong opponent, it was inevitable that they would want to exchange pointers.

The eyes of rhe primordial realm’s prodigies also shone.

They also wanted to know how powerful the heaven realm’s geniuses were.

“Alright, let’s have a spar then!”

The armored man nodded. This was their plan when they brought the heaven realm s prodigies here.

“Many thanks, general!’1

The burly teenager cupped his fists and stepped forward, sweeping his gaze across Lu Ming and the other ten.

He had short, needle-like hair, and his eyes were as sharp as a lion’s.

what I cultivate is the immemorial martial arts of the immemorial system. There should be some among you who cultivate the immemorial system, right?

The short-haired teenager said as he glanced at the ten people with a faint arrogance.

Bang! Bang! Bang!

Bao de, ao ke, and ancient devil stepped forward at the same time, their bodies erupting with powerful auras.

“I’ll fight you!”

Bao de said. His body was like an iron tower, filled with endless power.

“He’s mine!’1

I’m sorry,” said Pinker with a cold look in his eyes.

He was a royal member of rhe true dragon clan, the purple-gold true dragon.

However, the other party used Nine Dragons to pull the carriage, which made him extremely unhappy.

The short-haired teenager glanced at the three of them, and a faint smile appeared on the corner of his mouth. He didn’t hide his contempt at all.

an immemorial body cultivator, an immemorial demonic Dao, and an immemorial devil Dao. Very good. The three of you, come at me together!

The short-haired teenager said lightly, and his contempt became even stronger.

“What?”

Many people’s faces changed. This short-haired teenager’s tone was too arrogant. He actually asked Bao de and the other two to attack him together.

It should be known that Bao de had won fourth place, and his combat strength was extremely strong. With Pinker and ancient devil, he could even fight Yuan Xin.

This short-haired teenager had such strong combat power?

“Arrogant! I’ll fight you!”

you’re courting death! creak was already furious, and now that he was being looked down on, how could he hold it in? he roared and transformed into his true form, pouncing towards the short-haired teenager. His five dragon claws stepped out continuously, wanting to tear the short-haired teenager apart.

BOOM!

I’he short-haired teenager struck out with his palm.

His palm directly pierced through the void and collided with creak’s Dragon Claw.

oww!

Creak roared, and its entire dragon body trembled violently as it retreated.

“That’s…”

Everyone saw that creak’s Dragon Claw had split open. It was covered in cracks and blood was flowing out.

One move and Chek was injured. It was shocking.

Many people’s gazes turned serious. This short-haired young man’s combat strength was absolutely terrifying.

Tian Ming and Yuan Xin’s eyes turned serious.

“I said, the three of you attack together, or you won’t be able to withstand a single blow! ”

The short-haired young man said, his contempt growing.

“Then I’ll fight you!”

Bao de roared. His burly body swelled up and he punched our.

He also punched through the void.

At the same time, the elder Devil also attacked. A beam of demonic light slashed at the other party.

Roar!

die! ao ke roared. Blood Qi filled the air, and the wound on his Dragon Claw healed quickly. Purple-gold light filled his body as he charged at the short-haired teenager.

The three heaven’s favorites from the immemorial system attacked at the same time. It was earth-shattering.

“Hahaha, this is more like it!”

The short-haired teenager laughed. One of his palms changed, as if it had turned into Jade. It was so transparent that even the blood vessels in his flesh could be seen.

BOOM! boom! boom!

i’he short-haired teenager attacked and struck out Three Palms in a row.

Bang!

Ancient devil collided with a palm print. His body shook violently and he was sent flying a few thousand meters. He coughed up blood and his aura weakened. He was seriously injured.

Bang! Bang!

Then, Pinker and Bao de also retreated.

“Just this much strength? Not enough, more!”

The short-haired teenager rushed towards Bao de and ao ke, his palms continuously striking out. Bao de and ao ke tried their best to resist, but they were no match for him. The palm of the short-haired teenager seemed to have the power to split the sky. Every palm seemed to be able to split them apart.

After more than ten moves, Bao de and ao ke coughed out large mouthfuls of blood. Their arms were broken, and they were seriously injured, unable to fight again.

Everyone was shocked. This short-haired teenager was too terrifying. There were no nomological fluctuations on his body. It was obvious that he also cultivated the ancient system.

However, he was astonishingly strong, easily defeating Bao de, Aike, and ancient devil.

“He must be one of rhe top heaven’s favorites in the heaven realm!”

Someone guessed.

“You guys are too weak!”

The short-haired teenager glanced at Bao de and the other two, then stepped back.

Bao de, ao ke, and ancient Devil’s faces were ugly, but the other side was indeed powerful, which made them feel helpless and gave them a big blow.

I’m here to spar with rhe primordial realm’s prodigy!

After the short-haired teenager went back, another teenager walked out from the heaven realm.

This person was wearing a gray robe, and his eyes were as bright as rhe stars. He looked at the crowd and said,” I cultivate the nomological system. Who would like to spar with me? ”

“I’ll fight you!”

Yun llaoge was the first to speak. He stepped forward, and the void around him rose and fell like waves. His two-star illusionary divine cultivation was undoubtedly on display.

son of space-time, two-star illusionary Emperor? How about this, I will also suppress my cultivation to two-star illusionary Emperor!

The gray-robed young man said. Then, a powerful aura emanated from his body. He was a two-star void Emperor.

Everyone was shocked. The gray-robed young man’s words were obvious. His real cultivation base was beyond that of a two-star illusionary divine. Now, he was going to fight Yun llaoge, who was at the same level as him.

“Since that’s the case, don’t regret it!”

Yun llaoge said. As soon as he finished speaking, he made his move. He pierced through the void and charged toward his opponent at an astonishing speed.

I’he gray-robed young man’s face remained calm. At that moment, he waved his hand, causing nomological laws to erupt. A huge cauldron appeared in his hand.

Primordial chaos laws!

This person was a son of primordial chaos. At that moment, the cauldron in his hand was formed from primordial chaos laws.

The primordial chaos cauldron quickly grew to the size of a mountain and pressed down on Yun Haoge.

The primordial chaos cauldron’s power was simply too astonishing. It directly crushed the void and caused space time to become chaotic.

BOOM!

Wherever the primordial chaos cauldron passed by, the space exploded continuously. Yun Haoge’s expression changed drastically. At that moment, he felt a shocking force coming towards him. He wanted to escape, but he couldn’t. He could only face it head-on.

He used all his strength and struck the primordial chaos cauldron. However, the result was that his body was sent flying. He spar out a large mouthful of blood and his arm exploded. It was a terrible sight.

Many people gasped.

One move. Yun Haoge had been defeated in just one move.

The other party did not display a very high cultivation level. Instead, he had suppressed his cultivation to the level of a two-star illusionary Emperor. He was on the same level as Yun Haoge, but he had defeated Yun Haoge with one move. How was this possible?

Many people found it hard to believe, but this was the truth!

“He’s too weak!”

The gray-robed young man shook his head and laughed. He then looked at Yuan Xin and said, ” “I can sense that you have the pure chaotic body.. Eight me!”
